 .----------------------------- r e l e a s e info --------------------------+
 -  You're  not  on your typical dungeon crawler anymore. Guy vs. The Wicked '
 '  and Nefarious Land comes to put up  a  challenge  to  the  most  skilled
    players.  With a top down view and fast paced action, you must guide Guy
 `  through 5 dungeons filled with evil creatures,  traps  and  pop  culture
 `  references. But  fear  not!  While  on Guy's shoes you will count with a
 `  handful of weapons, items and skills to be successful on  your  journey.
 .  But don't think it will be easy: To be the guy you must deserve it.
 :
 |  Features :
 |
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 5 dungeons to explore and overcome.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 2 game modes to take your skills to the limit.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3 possible endings.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3 types  of  weapons  with  particular  gameplay styles, totaling nine
 |    usable weapons.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3 powerful skills to help you on your journey.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 21 types of monsters to be defeated with different strategies.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 5 bosses who demand the best of your abilities.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 4 bonus stages to test your skills.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Over 50 achievements, between medals and trophies.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Funny and charismatic characters.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Hours of hardcore gameplay.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ And...
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ One Guy.                                                               .
 |                                                                           :
 |  More info : http://www.cogmonkeys.com/GuyVsTheWickedAndNefariousLand     |

|   |
|   |  Ripped: Nothing.
|   |
|   |  READNFO: We choose to release using "READNFO" because this game never
|   |           was released in scene but this game wich is v1.20 was out on
|   |           Digital Stores in Sept 2012 and in section 7, subsection 7.1
|   |           in 0day rules,  mention its only allowed to rels +1 year old
|   |           games using READNFO or INTERNAL tags.
|   |
|   |  Notes: This game requires Adobe AIR. If you need you can found on
|   |         gamefolder Redist.
|   |
|   |  Game is MULTI2!: English and Portuguese.
